snippet: Some of the more controversial sections of the law may be altered or eliminated.
abstract: Alabama is considering major revisions to its immigration policies nearly a year after enacting an immigration law that supporters describes as the toughest in the country; law has faced a backlash from civil liberties advocates and business leaders.
lead_paragraph: Some of the more controversial sections of the law may be altered or eliminated.

headline.seo: Alabama May Alter New Immigration Policies
headline.main: Alabama May Revise New Policies on Migrants
headline.print_headline: Alabama May Revise New Policies On Migrants
